text: @SecPompeo The Chinese Communist Party didn't just cover-up  the WuhanVirus outbreak, the WuhanVirus was a biological weapon created by the Chinese Communist Party and this WuhanVirus world massacre was a deliberate act by the Chinese Communist Party. #WuhanVirus #ChineseVirus
